subject: Quick Release Variant
description_text:
Hey Guys,

i just purchased your „Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1” with the included quick release without actually checking what kind of quick release it is. Is it Simagic Compatible?
Thanks!

Mit besten Grüßen / best regards / 감사합니다


[cid:image001.png@01DC6934.1B1D8E90]

Patrick Schmidt
Verkaufsberater


E   p.schmidt@greinecker.at<mailto:p.schmidt@greinecker.at>
T   +43 7246 8866-16
W  www.greinecker.at<../../../../../cfagerer/Desktop/www.greinecker.at>


Autohaus Greinecker GmbH
Kieswerkstraße 1
4623 Gunskirchen
Austria


[cid:image002.png@01DC6934.1B1D8E90]<https://twitter.com/kia_motors>
[cid:image003.png@01DC6934.1B1D8E90]<https://www.facebook.com/autohausgreinecker>
[cid:image004.png@01DC6934.1B1D8E90]<https://www.instagram.com/autohausgreinecker/>

conversations.body_text: Hi Patrick Schmidt,  Our QR supports a 70mm bolt pattern. If you want to connect it to a Simagic wheel/base, an additional adapter is required.

So it is not a 6/4 ball design and not simagic compatible?
Maybe add the design of the qr to the description to avoid confusion.

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Good Morning,

would there be a possibility to cancel the order so I can order one without the wrong quick release?
Thanks.

Mit besten Grüßen / best regards / 감사합니다


[cid:image001.png@01DC69B0.4592EE50]

Patrick Schmidt

Hi Patrick Schmidt,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. May I ask for your order number?

Hi there,

thanks for the reply, unfortunately, I have already received the wheel with the incompatible QR, so there is no need to cancel.
It would be nice to add a footnote so that the next person does not waste the 18 Euros for the QR.

Thanks!

The order number was SSN4595

Mit besten Grüßen / best regards / 감사합니다
